messages.messageBody:
Ron et al -
I posted it in the photo folders in my folder - Toryu-mon - if you go
to Yahoo and "My Groups" you will see the Photo folder. If you find
you cannot get there I will send it to you direct.
-t
Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil

Ron
